page.title: 12UNEMPLOYMENT
page.content: Very few people work in the immediate area.This trend started years ago when the collieries,lead works,paper mill,railway station,local shops closed.Shotton steelworks and Courtaulds requiring a smaller work force have increased unemployment in the area.Many people have not secured employment since being made redundant.The possible closure of Courtaulds(Greenfield) is a constant threat to many local people.Several fathers now work on oil rigs in Saudi Arabia and driving lorries abroad.They spend a considerable amount of time away from home.Further possible closure of local industry and lack of new enterprises has demorolised the local people.
